CustomField.formula: IF( RecordTypeId = "0126A000000isgx", Supplier_Address__c & "," & " " & Supplier_City_State_Zip__c , Receiver_Address__c & "," & " " & Receiver_City_State_Zip__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Pick-up will be Supplier Location, If Delivery will be Receiver Location as Destination
CustomField.label: Destination
